issue.title: Move Wire button from left palette to Toolbar icon

content.raw:
Ian, the Wire button is a mentor2 thing created in the CMLEditor.    The joint type pull-down in the toolbar is a gazebo Model Editor widget.

Is the plan to allow the CMLEditor to add a menu item to the joint type widget or do you want to more formally add wiring/electrical connections into the gazebo branch?
content.html:
Ian, the Wire button is a mentor2 thing created in the CMLEditor. The joint type pull-down in the toolbar is a gazebo Model Editor widget.

Is the plan to allow the CMLEditor to add a menu item to the joint type widget or do you want to more formally add wiring/electrical connections into the gazebo branch?
